oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Simple proofs of two results on convolutions of unimodal distributions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PURKAYASTHA, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: convolution
khintchine's representation
symmetry
unimodality
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We give simple proofs of two results about convolutions of unimodal distributions. The first of these results states that the convolution of two symmetric unimodal distributions on R is unimodal. The other result states that symmetrization of a unimodal random variable gives a symmetric unimodal random variable. Both our proofs avoid Khintchine's representation of a random variable that is unimodal about zero, and use the integral representation of the expectation of a non-negative random variable with its tail probability as the integrand.
